page.title: 08OUR VILLAGE
page.content: Our village has lots of things you can do. The babies have a playschool and they visit us before they come into the reception class when they are five or rising five. We call the reception class children 'microdots' because they are so tiny at first. There is a Scout Cub pack, Brownies and Guides for children.The Womens Institute, Church Choir, Sunday School, Senior Citizens Friendship Club provide for the adults. The Village Hall is used by all age groups and also the playing field. The school has an association and the people, mainly parents of children at the school and teachers hold events to make money for extras for the schools pupils. Some of the money raised is used to help with school educational visits and also our
